name: d3-grid
description: Create a grid of elements the d3 way

scripts.pretest: rm -rf build && mkdir build && json2module package.json > build/package.js && rollup -f umd -n d3_grid -o build/d3-grid.js -- index.js
scripts.prepublish: npm run test && uglifyjs build/d3-grid.js -c -m -o build/d3-grid.min.js && cp build/d3-grid.js examples/d3-grid.js
scripts.postpublish: zip -j build/d3-grid.zip -- LICENSE README.md build/d3-grid.js build/d3-grid.min.js
